selection.label: Chombo cha kuchagua
selection.defaultStatus: Bofya neno au tumia vitufe vya mishale kuvinjari.

arrow.label: Chombo cha mshale
arrow.selectAnchor: Chagua maneno ya nanga, kisha bonyeza <kbd>Enter</kbd>.

highlight.label: Chombo cha kuangazia
highlight.selectWords: Chagua maneno ya kuangazia, kisha bonyeza <kbd>Enter</kbd>.

comments.label: Chombo cha maoni
comments.selectWords: Chagua maneno ya kutoa maoni, kisha bonyeza <kbd>Enter</kbd>.

underline.label: Chombo cha kupigia mstari
underline.selectWords: Chagua maneno ya kupigia mstari, kisha bonyeza <kbd>Enter</kbd>.

eraser.label: Chombo cha kufuta
eraser.status: Bofya na uburute ili kufuta vidokezo.

lockHint: Bonyeza <kbd>Esc</kbd> <kbd>K</kbd> ili kufunga kihariri baada ya kukamilisha maudhui.
